text: Tumi niscaya'i dekhate pabe ye yara imana eneche tadera sathe satrutaya saba ca'ite kathora loka hacche ihudira o yara sarika kare, ara niscaya'i tumi abiskara karabe ye yara imana eneche tadera sathe bandhutbe saba ca'ite tadera ghanistha hacche ora yara bale -- ''nihsandeha amara khristana.â€™â€™ Eti e'i jan'ya ye tadera madhye rayeche padarira o sadhusann'yasira, ara yehetu tara ahankara kare na.
